about_the_game:
Winter Winds is a dark fantasy psychological horror game with gameplay based on environmental exploration and turn based combat.

You may be mute, and an objectively bad person, but you're also the only one out here facing the monsters around every corner. Good luck!

"Features."

O - Restore the sun alone or let the candid neighborhood Angel detective, Aly, and her shotgun, join you.

X - Discover 9 different endings, some being more serious than others.

O - Explore to find secrets and Icehearts to raise your stats in 2bit stylized, mostly abandoned town.

X - Loosen your grip on reality to inflict more damage!

O - Discover a way to be able to speak and find out what your name could be.

X - Brace yourself for two unique opportunities to get scammed!

O - Utilize normal weapons or magic spells to kill night creatures and bosses.

X - Playthrough with several different game modes or cheat codes.

*

Winter Winds in my experience takes on average about 2 - 2.5 hours to complete with normal settings.

This game has / is being developed by one person, so please excuse any unprofessional mistakes that may be present.

If you have any questions or inquiries, you can email me at @ bustonuttt@gmail.com.

name: Winter Winds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 558 MB available space

short_description: Winter Winds is a grim fantasy RPG where you play as a mute, recently resurrected sadist with the mission to return the missing sun to the sky, with or without the help of an outspoken angel detective.
